channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The tree are started to hang out vet in my garden and damage my fence I have had to have these cut few time along year and now find my self no longer being able to do this , there atarting to lean on my fence in which I spent a lot money on security, 1st July
item.description:
Can these be cut and maintain so don t damage fence please there hanging over in my property , there not my trees they belong to Bromley council , thank you so much I can t find my self being able to maintain that tree no longer due to heath issues
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 158, Mottingham Road, Coldharbour, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Substance (possibly paint spillage) extending from 29 all the way to 35, where the rest of it has been emptied on the pavement. Please can this area be pressure washed. Sorry I don’t have a pressure washer or I would do it myself- even though it was not my spillage. Thanks, 1st July
item.description:
Substance (possibly paint spillage) extending from 29 all the way to 35, where the rest of it has been emptied on the pavement. Please can this area be pressure washed. Sorry I don’t have a pressure washer or I would do it myself- altho not my spillage

item.title: Broken location sign, 1st July
item.description:
Map sign has fallen off and been abandoned down the street. Seemed likely someone would steal or that it would be shattered. so I’ve put it in my garden so the council can collect it. Otherwise I can place the sign back if needed. Happy to help however needed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fernhead Road, Kensal Town, London
